quote: WikiLeaks also shows how John Podesta rigged the polls by oversampling Democrats, a voter suppression technique.
quotePlain: WikiLeaks also shows how John Podesta rigged the polls by oversampling Democrats, a voter suppression technique.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: A leaked email shows the Clinton campaign of 2008 consulted data firm that suggest oversampling in what is likely internal polling. The term refers to a common technique used by pollsters to analyze demographics groups more precisely than possible in a random sample.
checks.quotePlain: A leaked email shows the Clinton campaign of 2008 consulted data firm that suggest oversampling in what is likely internal polling. The term refers to a common technique used by pollsters to analyze demographics groups more precisely than possible in a random sample.

claims.title: Wikileaks data shows Podesta rigged polls
claims.negative: Wikileaks data doesn't show Podesta rigged polls
claims.negativePlain: Wikileaks data doesn’t show Podesta rigged polls
